dialog: Finally, I'm now a full-fledged Space Pilot!
I can't wait to find out what my first assignment is
Your mission is to recover the remains of a comm satellite that may have crashed on the lunar surface.
There are unconfirmed reports of hostile spacecrafts orbiting the moon.
Your ship's debris impact countermeasures should provide adequate protection in case of an attack.
I think I need backup here
We are sending reinforcement to your position as soon as possible. Godspeed.
